H0.text: Which organisation was founded in 1863 after the publication of the book 'A Memory Of Solferino' by the Swiss businessman Henri Dunant. International Committee of Humanitarian Law

H1.text: Which organisation was founded in 1863 after the publication of the book 'A Memory Of Solferino' by the Swiss businessman Henri Dunant. Swiss Aid Society

H2.text: Which organisation was founded in 1863 after the publication of the book 'A Memory Of Solferino' by the Swiss businessman Henri Dunant. Solferino Relief Organization

H3.text: Which organisation was founded in 1863 after the publication of the book 'A Memory Of Solferino' by the Swiss businessman Henri Dunant. Red Cross

A4.text: The sub-committee formed in 1863 by the Geneva Society for Public Welfare became the International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC), which is part of the Red Cross movement.

A5.text: The International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC) was established in 1863, which is the same organization as the Red Cross.
